rows.label: tlk70000049_03_msg001
rows.name:
Though it is a delicate topic, I hear the
king has been long troubled by his failure
to conceive a child with his wife.

rows.label: tlk70000049_03_msg002
rows.name:
Of course, it presented the
immediate problem of
succession to the throne...

rows.label: tlk70000049_03_msg003
rows.name:
But I fear it may also have been your
birth, Prince Adel, that damaged his
relationship with his wife beyond repair.

rows.label: tlk70000049_03_msg004
rows.name:
They never did manage to produce a
legitimate heir, which is why you
were summoned here to the mainland.

rows.label: tlk70000049_03_msg005
rows.name:
On the night he made that difficult
decision, His Majesty said something
none of us retainers will ever forget.

rows.label: tlk70000049_03_msg006
rows.name:
"The life of royalty is a cruel one.
To think I cannot even allow my own
child the freedom he deserves."
